articles.author: Ben Turner
articles.title: 'Missing' blob of water predicted to be in the Atlantic finally found - Livescience.com
articles.description: The newly discovered water mass, called the Atlantic Equatorial Water, stretches from Brazil to West Africa.
articles.content: Scientists have discovered a previously undetected water mass in the middle of the Atlantic Ocean: a gigantic body of water stretching across the Atlantic from the tip of Brazil to the Gulf of Guinea… [+3054 chars]

articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: Israel-Hamas conflict: BRICS leaders, UN to hold video summit Tuesday on Gaza | Mint - Mint
articles.description: BRICS leaders, along with the heads of state of six invited countries, will participate in a video summit on Tuesday to discuss the Israel-Hamas conflict. South African President Cyril Ramaphosa will chair the meeting, which will also include UN Secretary-Gen…
articles.content: South African President Cyril Ramaphosa will chair a video summit with BRICS leaders on Tuesday to discuss the Israel-Hamas conflict. The heads of state of six countries invited to join the group ear… [+2222 chars]
